verses.verse: לִשְׁלֹמֹ֨ה ׀ <S%H8010><s%> [A Psalm] for Solomon אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God מִ֭שְׁפָּטֶיךָ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king תֵּ֑ן <S%H5414><s%> Give וְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> and thy righteousness לְבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> son מֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> unto the king's
יָדִ֣ין <S%H1777><s%> He shall judge עַמְּךָ֣ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְצֶ֑דֶק <S%H6664><s%> with righteousness וַעֲנִיֶּ֥יךָ <S%H6041><s%> and thy poor בְמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> with judgment

יִשְׂא֤וּ <S%H5375><s%> shall bring הָרִ֓ים <S%H2022><s%> The mountains שָׁ֘ל֥וֹם <S%H7965><s%> peace לָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> to the people וּ֝גְבָע֗וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and the little hills בִּצְדָקָֽה׃ <S%H6666><s%> by righteousness

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט ׀ <S%H8199><s%> He shall judge עֲ‍ֽנִיֵּי־ <S%H6041><s%> the poor עָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people י֭וֹשִׁיעַ <S%H3467><s%> he shall save לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children אֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> of the needy וִֽידַכֵּ֣א <S%H1792><s%> and shall break in pieces עוֹשֵֽׁק׃ <S%H6231><s%> the oppressor

יִֽירָא֥וּךָ <S%H3372><s%> They shall fear עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> thee as long as שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> the sun וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> endure יָ֝רֵ֗חַ <S%H3394><s%> and moon דּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> throughout all דּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1755><s%> generations

יֵ֭רֵד <S%H3381><s%> He shall come down כְּמָטָ֣ר <S%H4306><s%> like rain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon גֵּ֑ז <S%H1488><s%> upon the mown כִּ֝רְבִיבִ֗ים <S%H7241><s%> grass as showers זַרְזִ֥יף <S%H2222><s%> [that] water אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

יִֽפְרַח־ <S%H6524><s%> flourish בְּיָמָ֥יו <S%H3117><s%> In his days צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> shall the righteous וְרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> and abundance שָׁ֝ל֗וֹם <S%H7965><s%> of peace עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> till בְּלִ֥י <S%H1097><s%> is no יָרֵֽחַ׃ <S%H3394><s%> so long as the moon

וְ֭יֵרְדְּ <S%H7287><s%> He shall have dominion מִיָּ֣ם <S%H3220><s%> also from sea עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יָ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> to sea וּ֝מִנָּהָ֗ר <S%H5104><s%> and from the river עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> unto the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

לְ֭פָנָיו <S%H6440><s%> before יִכְרְע֣וּ <S%H3766><s%> shall bow צִיִּ֑ים <S%H6728><s%> They that dwell in the wilderness וְ֝אֹיְבָ֗יו <S%H341><s%> him and his enemies עָפָ֥ר <S%H6083><s%> the dust יְלַחֵֽכוּ׃ <S%H3897><s%> shall lick

מַלְכֵ֬י <S%H4428><s%> The kings תַרְשִׁ֣ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> of Tarshish וְ֭אִיִּים <S%H339><s%> and of the isles מִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> presents יָשִׁ֑יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> shall bring מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> the kings שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba וּ֝סְבָ֗א <S%H5434><s%> and Seba אֶשְׁכָּ֥ר <S%H814><s%> gifts יַקְרִֽיבוּ׃ <S%H7126><s%> shall offer

וְיִשְׁתַּחֲווּ־ <S%H7812><s%> shall fall down ל֥וֹ כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מְלָכִ֑ים <S%H4428><s%> Yea all kings כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> before him all nations יַֽעַבְדֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יַ֭צִּיל <S%H5337><s%> For he shall deliver אֶבְי֣וֹן <S%H34><s%> the needy מְשַׁוֵּ֑עַ <S%H7768><s%> when he crieth וְ֝עָנִ֗י <S%H6041><s%> the poor וְֽאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> has עֹזֵ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> also and [him] that hath no helper לֽוֹ׃

יָ֭חֹס <S%H2347><s%> He shall spare עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on דַּ֣ל <S%H1800><s%> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹת <S%H5315><s%> the souls אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <S%H34><s%> of the needy יוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> and shall save

מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8496><s%> from deceit וּ֭מֵחָמָס <S%H2555><s%> and violence יִגְאַ֣ל <S%H1350><s%> He shall redeem נַפְשָׁ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> their soul וְיֵיקַ֖ר <S%H3365><s%> and precious דָּמָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> shall their blood בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <S%H5869><s%> be in his sight

וִיחִ֗י <S%H2421><s%> And he shall live וְיִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and to him shall be given לוֹ֮ מִזְּהַ֪ב <S%H2091><s%> of the gold שְׁ֫בָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> of Sheba וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> prayer also shall be made בַּעֲד֣וֹ <S%H1157><s%> about תָמִ֑יד <S%H8548><s%> for him continually כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [and] daily יְבָרֲכֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <S%H1288><s%> shall he be praised

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become פִסַּת־ <S%H6451><s%> There shall be an handful בַּ֨ר ׀ <S%H1250><s%> of corn בָּאָרֶץ֮ <S%H776><s%> in the earth בְּרֹ֪אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the top הָ֫רִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains יִרְעַ֣שׁ <S%H7493><s%> thereof shall shake כַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <S%H3844><s%> like Lebanon פִּרְי֑וֹ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit וְיָצִ֥יצוּ <S%H6692><s%> shall flourish מֵ֝עִ֗יר <S%H5892><s%> and [they] of the city כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> like grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the earth

יְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> endure שְׁמ֨וֹ <S%H8034><s%> His name לְֽעוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> shall endure for ever לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> as long as שֶׁמֶשׁ֮ <S%H8121><s%> the sun [יָנִין כ] (יִנֹּ֪ון <S%H5125><s%> be continued ק) שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name וְיִתְבָּ֥רְכוּ <S%H1288><s%> and [men] shall be blessed ב֑וֹ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> in him all nations יְאַשְּׁרֽוּהוּ׃ <S%H833><s%> shall call him blessed

בָּר֤וּךְ ׀ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> [be] the LORD אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עֹשֵׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> who only doeth נִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> wondrous things לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

וּבָר֤וּךְ ׀ <S%H1288><s%> And blessed שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> name כְּבוֹד֗וֹ <S%H3519><s%> [be] his glorious לְע֫וֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וְיִמָּלֵ֣א <S%H4390><s%> be filled כְ֭בוֹדוֹ <S%H3519><s%> [with] his glory אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> and may the whole הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and let the whole earth אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <S%H543><s%> Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> and Amen
כָּלּ֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> are ended תְפִלּ֑וֹת <S%H8605><s%> The prayers דָּ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <S%H3448><s%> of Jesse
